name: 7th International Conference on New Trends in Social Sciences
content: The 7th International Conference on New Trends in Social Sciences is a premier gathering of top academic minds. Coming to the vibrant city of â€ŒPrague on the 20-22 September, NTSSCONF will feature distinguished speakers, the most relevant agenda topics, and vigorous discussions on the latest trends in the field. Whether you are looking for a platform to publish your latest research, are interested in presenting, or want to listen to inspiring presentations, we are looking forward to welcoming you to Prague. To make your conference experience even more memorable, you are invited to join a free tour of the city and discover its hidden treasures. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour free of charge, so learn about Prague City. All accepted and registered papers will be published with ISBN numbers in soft form. All papers have publication opportunities in various indexed international journals: SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS, and conference proceedings. The NTSSCONF will return as an in-person event in Prague in Sep 2024 & also include the live-stream Virtual component for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, connect, and network. Delegates can attend & present their papers either in person or online from wherever they are in the world. An Invitation Letter will be issued and sent after registration and payment of the registration fee.
